resources.string: various options in prayers as clicable hyperlinks
In the text of prayers display:
display button for first vespers for Sundays and solemnitas for the day of celebration
wrap long lines according to printed edition
tight display of buttons for prayers
date buttons display after buttons for prayers
celebrate Epiphany on Sunday between Jan 2nd & 8th
celebrate Ascension of the Lord on Sunday
celebrate The Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ on Sunday

<html> <head> <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8"> <style type="text/css"> body { background-color: #000000; color: #cccccc; } a { color: #ffaa00; } </style> </head> <body>

Breviary application | What\'s new

Version 1.14.5

  • SK: Text notes for 2nd readings completed (vol. II).
  • CZ: Footnotes for 2nd readings completed.
  • CZ: Calendar & proper texts for franciscans (OFM).
  • Typos & errors fixed for all languages.

Version 1.14.4

  • Fix: Crash after click on e-mail address.
  • SK: Text notes for 2nd readings (communia; vol. IV).
  • CZ: Footnotes for 2nd readings (almost complete except Easter).
  • Fix: Antiphones (invitatory) for Memorials of the Blessed Virgin Mary on Saturday.
  • Typos & errors fixed for all languages.

Version 1.14.3

  • Fix: Default settings.
  • SK: Text notes for 2nd readings (propria; vol. I and III).
  • CZ: Fix for hymns in compline (Easter).
  • Typos fixed.

Version 1.14.2

  • Display only one of various choices (hymns, first or second reading, antiphones, preces).
  • Memorials of the Blessed Virgin Mary on Saturday are not celebrated as alternative to another feast of Virgin Mary.
  • SK, CZ: Fixes for liturgical calendar.
  • CZ: Fix for invitatory in Lent.

Version 1.14.1

  • New option: Display other antiphone for invitatory prayer (SK: per annum; CZ: advent).
  • SK, CZ: Fixes for liturgical calendar.
  • CZ: Proper texts for salesians (SDB) updated.

Version 1.14

  • New option: Display button for first vespers for Sundays and solemnitas for the day of celebration.
  • Enable to celebrate saints with higher level (as feasts/solemnities).
  • Fixes for liturgical calendar.

Version 1.13.2

  • New option: White/black background color (beamer/AMOLED display).
  • July 22th celebration level changed.
  • SK: Calendar & proper texts for carmelites (OCD), vincentinsâ€™ family (CM), and jesuits (SJ).

Version 1.13.1

  • New option: Display psalm omissions (works for SK only).
  • Footnotes for second readings (prayer with readings): CZ Advent + Christmas added.
  • CZ: Proper texts for salesians (SDB) fixed & completized.

Version 1.13

  • New option: Display footnotes for second readings (prayer with readings): CZ per annum only.
  • SK: New celebrations added to particular calendar.
  • CZ: Calendar & proper texts for salesians (SDB).

Version 1.12.3

  • Officium defunctorum, possibility to choose psalm 145 or 150 for morning prayer.
  • Possibility to use navigation arrows in the text.

Version 1.12.2

  • Possibility to show/hide full text for short responsories (in morning & evening prayers).

Version 1.12.1

  • New option: Possibility to configure app while navigation bar is displayed (enable text selection for copying).

Version 1.12

  • Possibility to display communia.
